# XDice Command-Line

Run python roll.py [options] <expr>

Usage:
roll [options] <expr>
Options:
-s Numeric score only

-h –help Displays help message –version Displays current xdice version

### Examples

  • Basic use

    python roll 1d6+1 >> 2 ([1]+1)

  • Numeric score only

    python roll -s 1d6+1 >> 2

xdice
